string.text: Greetings Woodsman! I heard in conversation that you can modify suits. What do you offer?
Greetings to you, too... I can only modify only the suits of mercenaries. There are other craftsmen who specialize in other suits. I can attach PNV and strengthen suits, by making them more durable
Excellent, these are important upgrades...
What can you offer in updating suits?
The Device of night vision...
On what suit to establish the device, on usual or already strengthened by me?
On the usual...
Excellent... Choose suit model
Mercenary outfit...
French ARMY...
Suit U.S.ARMY...
The Scientific suit of mercenaries...
The Exoskeleton of mercenaries...
The Suit of mercenaries with a gas mask...
The Modified suit of mercenaries...
Establish usual, green...
'Digital'...
